page.title: 18LAW AND ORDER
page.content: IF A ROAD SIGN SAYS 30 MPH AND YOU ARE GOING AT 40 MPH YOU CAN GET CAUGHT FOR BREAKING THE LAW.IN FRANCE THE POLICE CARRY GUNS BUT OUR POLICE CARRY TRUNCHEONS AND SMALL RADIOS.IN OUR AREA THE POLICE RIDE IN POLICE VANS, SOME HAVE DOGS IN THE BACK.IN OUR VILLAGE WE USED TO HAVE TWO POLICE HOUSES BUT THEY HAVE BEEN SOLD.OUR POLICEMAN IS CALLED P.C.MARLOW,HE HELPS US WITH CYCLING PROFICIENCY AND TELLS US ABOUT THE HIGHWAY CODE.IF A PERSON DOES SOMETHING WRONG HE HAS TO GO TO THE MAGISTRATES' COURT IN WIMBORNE.SOMETIMES THINGS ARE STOLEN BUT THERE IS NOT MUCH CRIME IN THIS BLOCK.
